title: Cinnamon and raisin oat cookies
ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '180g raisins', '225g butter, softened', '145g soft brown sugar', '200g caster sugar', '300g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '160g porridge oats']
